(Raspberry Pi alátét 8 db)
(cmd line: -i pi_alatet_8db.txt -t)
(plot cmd: -i pi_alatet_8db.txt -t -p)

(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d2 h19
yxz

t1
s50
f300

(mélység)
th = 2.5
(belső átmérő)
db = 2.5
(külső átmérő)
dk = sum(6.2,2,2)
print "dk: $dk"
c = 0.2

(h 4,4 d7.5 z1.2 c0.175 g0,0,0 np)
(h 4,4 d5 z1.2 c0.175 g0,0,0 np)

x = div($dk,2)
y = div($dk,2)
o = add($dk,3)

(1.sor)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c jg0.1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.3,0.9 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c jg0.1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.3,0.9 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c jg0.1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.3,0.9 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c jg0.1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.3,0.9 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c jg0.1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.3,0.9 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c jg0.1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.3,0.9 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c jg0.1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.3,0.9 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c jg0.1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.3,0.9 np
